snippet.title: Worms W.M.D Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The worms are back in their most destructive game yet. With a gorgeous, hand-drawn 2D look, brand new weapons, the introduction of crafting, vehicles and buildings plus the return of some much-loved classic weapons and gameplay, Worms W.M.D is the best worms experience ever.

Xbox One: http://bit.ly/WormsWMDxboxone
PlayStation 4: http://bit.ly/PS4WMD
Steam: http://bit.ly/WormWMD
GoG: http://bit.ly/WormsWMDgog

Team17, founded in 1990, are a fully independent Video Game Developer and Games Label, responsible for the Worms™ series, Beyond Eyes, Sheltered and many more. Ensure you never miss out on our latest videos by subscribing to us now: bit.ly/SubTeam17

Don't forget you can also
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/
Follow us on Twitter: http://bit.ly/FollowT17
